text:
Mentorloop | Full Stack JS Dev | Melbourne, Australia | Full-Time ONSITE | AUD 70-90k

Mentorloop is a Melbourne-based start-up making mentoring relationships easier to start, run and participate in.

We're currently looking for a mid-level full stack JS dev to join our small, friendly team.

Successful candidate has experience with:

  - Node backends
  - Single page apps with React & friends
  - Building mobile-first UIs
Full details at https://mentorloop.com/job-full-stack-developer/
